text: H. Benazir, a second year student studying Bachelor of Fisheries Science in Fisheries College and Research Institute, Thoothukudi won first prize in short story writing competitions both in Tamil and English conducted by G.Venkataswamy Naidu College, Kovilpatti on the occasion of its golden jubilee celebrations on January 28. According to a statement on Tuesday, the prize carrying a cash award of Rs.4,000 and a citation was given during the programme. G.Sugumar, Dean of FCRI and A.Srinivasan, Vice-President of Students’ Association, congratulated the winner.
title: FCRI student wins first prize
